entry.title: Trash Service in Wildwood, Missouri
entry.content:
Since the summer of 2019, trash service in Wildwood Missouri has been provided by Waste Connections.

Both trash and recycling services are provided by Waste Connections, your pickup days will vary based on your location.

If youâ€™re looking for large item pickup, for a couch, or other things, be sure to check with Waste Connections to get that scheduled.

Waste Connections of Missouri Website
entry.summary: Since the summer of 2019, trash service in Wildwood Missouri has been provided by Waste Connections.
